amendment.description: To improve the authority for operations of unmanned aircraft for educational purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1797 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1797 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Jones to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4191) To improve the authority for operations of unmanned aircraft for educational purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1797 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Jones to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1797 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
